articles.title: Rare strawberry moon in Toronto to illuminate sky
articles.description: As we approach summer, June’s strawberry moon will illuminate the skies Tuesday but this year, it will appear larger and lower on the horizon — becoming the lowest full moon since 2006.

articles.title: Using causal machine learning to identify potential ALS treatments
articles.description: Potential treatments for amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) and other neurodegenerative diseases may already be out there in the form of drugs prescribed for other conditions.

articles.title: Those ‘what I eat in a day’ TikTok videos aren’t helpful. They might even be harmful
articles.description: They might seem like harmless fun but in fact they can reinforce dangerous ideas about food, weight and body image.
articles.content:
You may have come across those “what I eat in a day” videos on social media, where people – usually conventionally attractive influencers wearing activewear – list everything they consumed that day.

articles.title: Lung cells in COPD patients show higher levels of soot-like carbon deposits
articles.description: Cells taken from the lungs of people with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) have a larger accumulation of soot-like carbon deposits compared to cells taken from people who smoke but do not have COPD, according to a study published today (Wednesday) in ERJ Open Research.

articles.title: Scott Wolf divorcing wife Kelley after 21 years
articles.description: Scott Wolf and his wife, Kelley, are divorcing after more than two decades of marriage. The '90s heartthrob's estranged parter announced the news on Tuesday.
